name: cv
description: * photo * typescript checker * pure native API, no framework * use SCSS * theme switch (light\black) * Language switcher (ENG\RU) * GitHub repo as the only source of truth with scheduled auto update * Mobile version * print version

scripts.build:all: npm run build:rus && npm run build:eng
scripts.build:pdf:eng: mkdir -p pdf && resume export --resume ./out/eng.json --theme ./theme --format pdf pdf/resume.eng.pdf
scripts.build:pdf:rus: mkdir -p pdf && resume export --resume ./out/rus.json --theme ./theme --format pdf pdf/resume.rus.pdf
scripts.build:pdf: npm run build:all && npm run build:pdf:eng && npm run build:pdf:rus
scripts.docker:run: docker stop cv-app 2>/dev/null && docker rm cv-app 2>/dev/null; docker run --name cv-app -p 6001:6001 -p 6002:6002 -p 6003:6003 cv
scripts.clean:output: rm -rf pdf && rm -rf public && rm -rf public-eng && rm -rf public-rus
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:output && npm run clean:lib
